getStatus(){return{initialized:this.isInitialized,hasApiKey:!!this.apiKey};}isDemoMode(){return!this.isInitialized;}getDemoMessage(){if(this.isDemoMode()){return'üéµ Demo Mode: Set REACT_APP_SUNO_API_KEY to enable AI music generation';}return'';}}// Export singleton instance
